alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 6:10PM EDT until July 15 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 745 PM EDT/645 PM CDT/. * At 609 PM EDT/509 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Columbia to near Graceville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Newton, Donalsonville, Bainbridge, Columbia, Centerville, Malone, Greenwood, Gordon, Iron City, Damascus, Campbellton, Brinson, Jakin, Bascom, Rock Hill, Lovedale, Donaldsonville A/P, Ellaville and Buena Vista. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
